name: CYBER RUN MISSION
description:
CYBER RUN MISSION is a dungeon crawler with one mission prototype.

If you want to play in better condition download the windows version (loading faster than HTML5 version between map).

CONTROL : Use ARROW, or WASD to move in the dungeon and your mouse to interact with the interface. You can press [M] to display the map in real time. You can press [Y] to restart the game. In the windows version press [F] to switching fullscreen mode.

-

DEV LOG PART : I've learn a lot of this week, i passed many hours to creating and managing inventory system, stats, battle etc... Thinking about the function of the interface, i've look a lot of videos of dungeon crawler to learn a lot. That's a good experience, i'm disapointed because create all this from nothing in one week was too big for only one personn i think ! And my result was not that i have think, but that's a good start !

-

For the graphics, i've use IA like DALL-E to generate portraits and some texture, i've modified a lot of them to have a best result  and i create other by myself.

The sound was created with Labchips, and the ambiant music with MusicMatch.

All the code was created in gamemaker from nothing.

-

If you enjoy this, tell me !
